title: Google grants limited access to its Gemini AI product to select institutions
description:
Google has granted partial access to its upcoming conversational AI product, according to a report from The InformationÂ on Sept. 15. That report indicates that Google has given a limited number of companies access to the product named Gemini, which has yet to be released more broadly. Gemini features a collection of large-language models (LLMs) that […]

The post Google grants limited access to its Gemini AI product to select institutions appeared first on CryptoSlate.
